product_name: Seattle Sports Stand Up Paddleboard Strap Carry System
long_description: The Seattle Sports Stand Up Paddleboard Strap Carry System makes it easy to transport your board to and from the water, and it doubles as a convenient way to hang your SUP for wall storage. Quick-release loops make it easy to take slack out of the straps and secure board for transport. Padded shoulder pad increases comfort during the carry. Built-in loop offers a place to hang the Seattle Sports Strap Carry System on a wall to store your paddleboard.
short_description: The Seattle Sports Stand Up Paddleboard Strap Carry System makes it easy to transport your board to and from the water, and it doubles as a convenient way to hang your SUP for wall storage.
